attributes.action: Set up a 'board of fact' that can refuse any publication the title of 'Newspaper' if they are proven to have persistently lied or distorted facts beyond reason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe in freedom and speech and the rights of the individual within the community to express their opinions.  I feel the right of choice is taken from the community of Britain when our source of mass information is riddled with lies.
Make the newspapers real again
